title: RMPMessageBuffer (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL RMPMessageBuffer
This FB represents a queue of messages that are stored in a RMPService; it is used both for sending and receiving
Methods:
AddMessage
ClearExpiredMessages
Delete
EnlargeExpirationTime
ExistsMessageWithHandle
GetMessage
GetMessageForReceiver
GetMessageToApplication
Lock
Unlock
